R Markdown

reactable(
  mtcars[,1:8],
  defaultColGroup = colGroup(headerClass = "group-header"),
  defaultColDef = colDef(headerClass = "header"),
  columnGroups = list(
    colGroup(name = "Car 1", columns = c("mpg", "cyl", "disp")),
    colGroup(name = "Car 2", columns = c("hp", "drat", "wt"))
    )
  )
